Golakganj - Madhyapetla, Borochoraikhola, Gaikhowa Pt-II, Berbhangi Pt-I | Erosion took place at Revenue Village Borochoraikhola under Golakganj Revenue Circle by River Gangadhar from 26/7/2022 to 7/8/2022. In this incident no houses were damaged. Land eroded 1B-0K-0L. Erosion took place at Revenue Village Madhyapetla under Golakganj Revenue Circle by River Gangadhar from 26/7/2022 to 7/8/2022. In this incident no houses were damaged. Land eroded 1B-2K-10L. (26.19126667, 89.82325278) Erosion took place at Revenue Village Gaikhowa Pt-II under Golakganj Revenue Circle by River Gangadhar from 24/07/2022 to 7/8/2022. In this incident no houses were damaged. Land eroded 1B-0K-0L. (26.08190556, 89.82803611) Erosion took place at Revenue Village Berbhangi Pt-I under Golakganj Revenue Circle by River Gangadhar from 26/7/2022 to 7/8/2022. In this incident no houses were damaged. Land eroded 2B-2K-10L. In this incident 8 no. of families shifted their house to another place (26.06108333, 89.82669444) | 38,  Agamoni - Village: Belguri Pt-I and Belguri Pt-II under Sindurai GP under Agomani Rev.
